subs.text: Sorry for the paucity of posts in the last few days. I've been moving around NYC in the heat, riding Citibikes and enjoying the change of pace. I will be back home by the end of the week and the normal posting may resume then, Murphy-willing. Meanwhile everything is fine.
I remember my first trip to Silicon Valley in 1979. Drove around for 30 years trying to find it. Never did. :smile:
